reviewText: A nice movie about a family working out problems when their son is involved in a rape case. The father who is a lawyer is trying to give his son's friends the right advice, but in the end, the conscience wins out. Well thought out. Stephen does such an excellent job as the conflicted father.
This would not play on my equipment.  Its probably been too much time to return it, I would like to and get a copy that works on my equipment.
